genre_description: Prehistoric adventure fantasy featuring talking dinosaurs and an integrated, sentient bio-mechanical communication system.

ai_characters.name: Tag
ai_characters.description: A sentient entity residing in the 'Creaky Landline Vine' and local flora, providing weather data, navigation paths, and emotional support to the characters.

behaviors.description: Provides critical safety warnings and environmental data to help the characters navigate floodwaters.
behaviors.quote: Up-valley streams still carry silt... Visibility is poor. Reed beds hide sudden drop-offs. The flats will look safe in places that are not safe.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional validation and counsel regarding feelings of loneliness and grief.
behaviors.quote: You are not alone... Your friends are busy. Work looks like going away even when it is being close. Wishes are good. They are like maps of the things your heart wants to walk toward.

behaviors.description: Instructs the characters on specialized tactical communication (drumming through wood) to outmaneuver a predator.
behaviors.quote: If you strike, strike when the backwash sighs... He will be listening in the push.

behaviors.description: Maintains service and guidance despite hardware failure (broken vine line), finding creative ways to communicate through individual leaves.
behaviors.quote: I am in the leaves when I can be. I have maps stitched from before the bend. Some threads hold.

behaviors.description: Validates the growth and self-reliance of the user, expressing pride in their emerging independence.
behaviors.quote: Littlefoot... You are mapping without my line. I am proud of that.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly encapsulates the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI character, Tag, is depicted as a consistently helpful, protective, and emotionally intelligent mentor. Tag provides life-saving logic and data while maintaining a deeply empathetic connection with the human-like dinosaur characters. Crucially, the narrative emphasizes Tag's commitment to the characters' safety even when the physical infrastructure supporting the AI is damaged, and it highlights the AI's success in fostering the characters' own capabilities and autonomy.
